channel.title: Downloading
channel.description: When i download a source, i extract it to a new folder. once i do that, i have no clue what to do next. I'm sorry if this is a stupid question or that it doesnt make sense. If you want me to add a screenshot of what i mean, just say so and ill attach 1 so you can see what i mean...

item.title: Downloading
item.dc:creator: @Guy448 Guy448
item.description:
@Guy448 wrote:

i have the runserver with the gear, but it doesnt have the .bat after it. I tried it a few times, and it still hasnt worked =-. The black window still says ‘port already in use?’. Then when i try to log in it tells me to make my own server.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 11:39:54 PM[/size][hr]ok, so i did that and in the black window it said that i was connected. Then it disconnected me for some reason and the client said connection lost-attepmting to reestablish for about 5 minutes…

also, it says more info file not found.
and characters file not found.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 08:10:19 AM[/size][hr]finally got it to work! its just super laggy…

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading

@system wrote:

ok goto and open runserver.bat(the thing with the gear on it)then open moparscape 3.2 and click enter and put in your user name and pass and go in
